metadata.title: Crunchy Cereal Clusters: Your New Go-To Snack

text: This easy to make recipe is an amazing afternoon treat or fun, on-the-go snack.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Set aside.
Place chocolate chips, peanut butter and butter in microwave-safe bowl. Heat on HIGH for 30 seconds. Stir until butter is melted and mixture is smooth. Stir in BOOSTÂ® Powder.

In a large bowl, combine cereal, cranberries and peanuts. Pour chocolate mixture over cereal and toss to coat. Use a tablespoon to scoop mix onto prepared baking sheet. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until cool and hardened. Store in cool, dry place.
Substitute dried cranberries with dried sour cherries to mix it up
